section.name: EclipseCON France 2013 - JavaFX Workshop
section.title: EclipseCON France 2013 - JavaFX Workshop
section.p: This application has been shown during Heroes Event at ToulouseJUG
Require Java 7 with JavaFX 2 Runtime (available for windows, mac and linux since 2.1 )

You can launch the application with Java Webstart: Click to launch this application with Java WebStart
Press F11 to activate fullscreen mode, use left-click to show the next slide (or page down), right click for previous slide (or page up).
You can download the whole application here : EclipseCON Workshop
You can download workshop files (Eclipse Juno + m2eclipse + efxclipse + Maven standalone + Jdk7u21) : EclipseCON Workshop
You can browse the source code on GitHub EclipseCON-France repository.
